name: Hamid Nawaz
title: Full-Stack Developer
summary: I build smooth, smart, and user-focused web applications—crafting logic, performance, and design into one experience

experience.title: Full-Stack Developer
experience.description: I’m a Full Stack Developer passionate about building interactive and user-friendly web applications. I work with modern technologies like Next.js and React.js, and I enjoy bringing ideas to life on both the frontend and backend. From creating real-time experiences with Socket.io to managing data efficiently with Node.js, I focus on delivering solutions that are not only functional but also intuitive for users. I love turning complex problems into seamless experiences that people enjoy using.

projects.title: E-Commerce Platform
projects.description: Full-stack e-commerce solution with payment integration, inventory management, and admin dashboard.

projects.title: Real-Time Chat Application
projects.description: WebSocket-based chat application with file sharing and user authentication.

projects.title: Project Management Tool
projects.description: Collaborative project management platform with task tracking and team collaboration features.

projects.title: Analytics Dashboard
projects.description: Data visualization dashboard with real-time metrics and reporting capabilities.

projects.title: API Gateway Service
projects.description: Microservices API gateway with rate limiting, authentication, and request routing.

projects.title: Mobile-First PWA
projects.description: Progressive web application with offline support and push notifications.
